PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Actimalt Liquid Regular by Muntons is a premium yellow-brown syrup crafted through enzyme-assisted hot water extraction of barley and malted barley, followed by filtration and vacuum evaporation concentration. This viscous liquid boasts a pleasant cereal and malt aroma with a sweet, characteristic malt flavor. Composed primarily of soluble extracts from barley and malted barley (typically 77.1–79.6%) and water (20.4–22.9%), it contains gluten at 2,570 mg/kg. Nutritionally, it provides 300-320 kcal per 100g, with 72-76g total carbohydrates, including maltose and maltotriose sugars, alongside proteins, dietary fiber, and minimal fats. Ideal for enhancing flavor, sweetness, and color in food and beverage applications, Actimalt Liquid Regular also supports moisture retention and fermentation processes. Its natural malt profile makes it a versatile ingredient for manufacturers seeking quality malt extracts with consistent analytical and microbiological standards.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: FAMB279 N&A Brown Sugar Type FL by WILD Flavors, Inc. is a premium natural flavoring designed to impart the rich, authentic taste of brown sugar with distinctive maple and molasses notes. Presented as a light brown/tan powder, this flavor blend enhances a wide variety of food and beverage products without adding sweetness or sugar content. Ideal for use in baked goods, beverages, confections, sauces, and dairy products, it delivers a deep caramel-like flavor that elevates product appeal. The flavoring supports moisture retention in baked items and contributes to a warm amber color, enhancing both taste and visual appeal. Manufactured under strict quality and microbiological standards, FAMB279 ensures safety and consistency. With a recommended shelf life of 270 days and ambient storage conditions, it offers versatility and convenience for food manufacturers aiming to create authentic, health-conscious, and cost-effective products with the nostalgic flavor of brown sugar.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Acerola juice concentrate, clarified with a Brix range of 64-68, is produced by SVZ Tomaszow Sp. z o.o. in Poland using sound and mature acerola cherries (Malpighia glabra L.). The concentrate undergoes a meticulous process including selection, depectinization, filtration, concentration, and packaging to ensure high quality. This product boasts a high vitamin C content ranging from 6000 to 8000 mg/kg, making it a potent natural antioxidant. It features an aromatic, typical acerola flavor with a sweet and acidic taste, and a visually appealing orange-yellow color. The concentrate has a pH between 2.7 and 3.5 and acidity as malic acid from 6.0 to 10.0 g/100g. It complies with stringent microbiological and pesticide residue standards, ensuring safety and purity. Recommended to be stored frozen, it has a shelf life of 24 months. Ideal for enhancing nutritional value and flavor in various food and beverage applications, this clarified acerola concentrate is a premium natural ingredient choice.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Accelerzyme® CPG BF, developed by DSM Food Specialties B.V., is a liquid carboxypeptidase enzyme preparation derived from a selected strain of Aspergillus niger. This green, clear to opalescent liquid enzyme is designed to accelerate the cheese ripening process by enhancing the breakdown of peptides and amino acids, which results in faster flavor development and reduced aging time. It is kosher and halal approved, suitable for vegans and vegetarians, and produced using biotechnological techniques that overexpress naturally present genes. The product maintains high protease activity (≥ 900 CPGU/ml) and complies with stringent safety and microbiological standards, ensuring absence of harmful pathogens and contaminants. Packaged in 20 kg sealed containers, it should be stored at 4-8°C for optimal shelf life of 24 months with minimal activity loss. Accelerzyme® CPG BF supports clean-label production, offering cheese manufacturers an efficient, sustainable, and high-quality solution to improve cheese maturation and flavor profiles.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: AUSTRIA JUICE GmbH offers premium Apple Juice Concentrate made by physically removing water from freshly pressed juice of sound and ripe apples (Malus domestica Borkh.). This concentrate is a clear, golden-yellow, viscous liquid with a typical apple flavor and taste. It complies with EU regulations, ensuring no allergens, GMOs, or harmful residues, making it safe and natural. The concentrate features 69.5-70.5 °Bx soluble solids, 1.8-2.7% total acidity as malic acid, and a pH range of 3.0 to 4.2, ensuring consistent quality. Microbiological standards are strictly maintained with low viable counts, yeasts, and molds. Packaged as agreed, it is recommended to be stored at 4-6°C with a shelf life of 6 months. This versatile concentrate is ideal for use in beverages, dairy, bakery, confectionery, and other food applications, delivering natural sweetness, flavor, and nutritional benefits.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: EXTER 100 - Bouillon by Exter B.V. is a premium savory soy liquid designed to enhance the flavor profile of various food products. Featuring a rich bouillon, meaty, and salty taste with sweet and caramelized notes, this brown liquid is ideal for applications such as salads (0.5-1.5%) and meatballs (1.0-2.0%). It contains 63% water and 16% salt, providing 85 kcal per 100 g. Certified Halal, suitable for Kosher diets, and vegetarian-friendly, EXTER 100 meets diverse dietary needs. It conforms to strict microbiological standards ensuring safety and quality. The product is stable for 24 months when stored dry at ambient temperatures (6-25°C). Packaged in 1200 kg IBC containers, it offers a cost-effective, versatile solution for food manufacturers seeking to impart authentic, savory flavors with clean label credentials. For detailed dosage and application guidance, contact Exter's sales representatives.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: Salads: 0.50 - 1.50 % by weight of finished product; Meat balls: 1.00 - 2.00 % by weight of finished product; General recommended dosage level: 0.50 - 2.00 % by weight of finished product

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC is a premium, free-flowing powder ranging from off-white to yellowish, derived from pure refined agar extracted from red seaweed species such as Gelidium and Gracilaria. Certified organic under EU legislation (Nº834/2007) and regulated by COPAE, it serves as an effective gelling and stabilizing agent in food applications. This natural polysaccharide forms soft gels without additives, offering a creamy texture that becomes viscous when stirred. It excels in milk-based systems by preventing fat and whey separation, enhancing spreadability, flavor release, and mouthfeel, and can also act as a fat replacer. With high water retention, it improves product shelf-life while maintaining low viscosity in hot solutions. Recommended dosage ranges from 0.2% to 1.5%, with preparation involving dispersion in water and boiling until fully dissolved. ROKOAGAR LS ORGANIC is ideal for confectionery, dressings, sauces, jams, and dietetic foods, stored best in cool, dry conditions between 2-30°C with a shelf life of 24 months.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: 0.2 - 1.5% The optimal dosage will depend on specific application and preferred texture.
FILE_NAME: PIM000009406-Rokoagar LS ORGANIC - Food Applications Eng - E01.pdf

This versatile flour is ideal for instant sauces, soups, purees, and hummus, serving as an effective thickener with high protein content, making it suitable for dietary formulations. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: RSF-200, developed by RIKEN VITAMIN CO., LTD., is a high-quality bread improver designed to enhance wheat-based products. Composed of mono- and diglycerides of fatty acids (E471), sodium stearoyl lactylate (E481), starch, and enzymes, it meets stringent purity standards set by FAO/WHO, EU, and US FDA. This yellowish-white powder with a slight characteristic odor is easy to incorporate, with a recommended dosage of 0.3% to 2.0% based on flour weight. RSF-200 ensures microbiological safety with low total plate counts and absence of coliforms, while heavy metals are kept within safe limits. Nutritionally, it contains 632 kcal per 100g, with 49g fat (mostly saturated) and 47g carbohydrates. The product is non-GMO and should be stored in cool, shaded, and dry conditions to maintain quality. Packaged in 20 kg paper bags with inner PE lining, RSF-200 has a shelf life of 12 months unopened, making it a reliable choice for consistent bread quality improvement.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: GALACIN NISIN 101 NACL 2.5, produced by Galactic S.A., is a natural antimicrobial food ingredient derived from the fermentation of Lactococcus lactis. This heat-resistant, non-dairy based powder contains 2.5% to 3.0% active nisin and a minimum of 90% sodium chloride, ensuring potent antimicrobial activity with a minimum potency of 1000 IU/mg. It effectively protects a wide range of food products against pathogens and Gram-positive spoilage bacteria, enhancing food safety and extending shelf life. The product complies with European regulations, is GRAS certified, non-GMO, and suitable for kosher and halal diets. It appears as a white to light brown powder with low moisture content (max 3%). GALACIN NISIN 101 is ideal for use in processed meats, dairy products, canned foods, seafood, and beverages. It supports clean-label formulations by providing natural preservation without altering sensory qualities. The product should be stored unopened between 0 and 20°C in a dry, well-ventilated room and has a shelf life of 24 months.

Composed primarily of ethanol (35-45%) and glycerine (15-22%), this allergen-free, GMO-free, and kosher-certified ingredient is ideal for clean-label food and beverage applications. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Cheddar Cheese Powder Hi Flavour from Ballantyne Foods Pty Ltd is a premium, uncoloured powder delivering a strong, well-rounded cheddar cheese flavor with savory and umami notes. Ideal for enhancing sauces, soups, snack coatings, convenience meals, biscuit fillings, and icings, this versatile ingredient elevates the taste and texture of various food products. Made from pasteurised milk solids, salt, starter culture, enzymes, and lactic acid as an acidity regulator, it contains milk allergens and may include animal rennet, making it halal but not vegetarian or kosher. Packaged in 20 kg polylined multiwall bags, it has an 18-month shelf life when stored in a cool, dry place below 25°C. PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: PHOSKADENT® SF, manufactured by BK Giulini GmbH, is a high-purity sodium fluoride chemical product designed specifically for dental applications. Presented as a white powder, it contains 98.0 to 102.0% sodium fluoride and is water-soluble, making it ideal for the fluoridation of oral care products. The product maintains a pH range of 8.0 to 12.0 (1% solution) and meets stringent safety standards with arsenic and heavy metal contents limited to a maximum of 3 ppm and 30 ppm respectively. With a bulk density of approximately 1100 g/l, PHOSKADENT® SF is packaged in 25 kg PE-lined paper bags, with other packaging options available upon request. It should be stored in a cool, dry place away from moisture to preserve its quality. PHOSKADENT® SF is essential for enhancing dental health by providing effective fluoride delivery in oral care formulations, supported by comprehensive safety and environmental guidelines provided by BK Giulini GmbH.

This white to beige powder is soluble in both cold and hot water but insoluble in oils and organic solvents. It is designed for versatile use in food, beverage, and nutraceutical applications, providing antioxidant, anti-inflammatory, and calming properties. The product complies with stringent European pharmacopoeia standards and is free from harmful contaminants such as heavy metals, pesticides, and microbiological impurities. With a shelf life of 24 months, it should be stored in a dry, cool place away from light. This extract is non-GMO, non-ionized, and free from TSE/BSE substances, making it a safe and reliable ingredient for enhancing flavor, preservation, and functional health benefits in various formulations.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Gellan gum from BLG is a hydrophilic polysaccharide produced through the fermentation of carbohydrates by Pseudomonas syringae. This versatile ingredient offers excellent dispersibility, temperature resistance, and suspension capabilities, forming a soft and elastic gel. It functions as a thickener, gelling agent, and stabilizer, making it ideal for use in UHT and HTST neutral dairy beverages such as chocolate milk, cafe latte, milk tea, and nutritional dairy drinks. The product is an off-white flowing powder that dissolves in water to form a viscous solution, with a suggested additive amount of 0.025% to 0.035%. It passes calcium and sodium ion gel tests, ensuring reliable gel strength and stability. With a shelf life of 24 months when stored unopened at room temperature, BLG's gellan gum is packaged in food-grade PE bags within paper barrels, providing a safe and high-quality solution for enhancing texture, stability, and suspension in various food and beverage applications.

APPLICATIONS: ['Plant-Based Dairy Alternative', 'Dairy']
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: CheeseMaker CF30, developed by KMC in Denmark, is a specialized modified potato starch designed specifically for vegan cheese alternatives, particularly sliced cheese. This white powder solution enhances the texture and functionality of plant-based cheeses, providing an elastic, cheese-like consistency ideal for slicing and dicing. Applied at a dosage of 19-21%, CheeseMaker CF30 supports clean label initiatives as it is non-GMO, allergen-free, and compliant with halal and kosher standards. It boasts excellent safety and quality credentials, with production facilities certified to ISO 22000 and BRC standards. Nutritionally, it is low in fat and protein, with high carbohydrate content primarily from starch, and contains minimal vitamins and minerals. The product has a shelf life of three years and requires storage in a dry, cool place away from strong odors. CheeseMaker CF30 is an innovative, cost-effective ingredient that enables manufacturers to produce high-quality, versatile vegan cheese products that meet modern dietary and ethical demands.
RECOMMENDED_DOSAGE: CheeseMaker CF30 is applied in a dosage of 19-21%.

PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: RP Maracaibo 65% is a premium dark chocolate couverture crafted by Max Felchlin A.G in Switzerland. Known for its rich 65% cocoa content, this special dark chocolate is customized for Akutagawa and is ideal for a variety of culinary applications. It features a smooth texture and a deep chocolate taste, making it perfect for confectionery, baking, beverage formulations, and gourmet creations. The chocolate is packaged in a 1kg bulk bag with an outer layer made of PE and paper, ensuring freshness and quality. It should be stored under 18°C to maintain its optimal condition and has a shelf life of 24 months. RP Maracaibo 65% contains milk and almond allergens and may have almond contamination. This versatile chocolate is favored by professionals for its balanced flavor profile and consistent quality, enhancing the taste and texture of premium chocolates, pastries, sauces, and beverages.

PRODUCT_NAME: FARINA PROTEICA DI NOCI BIOLOGICA / ORGANIC WALNUT PROTEIN POWDER
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Parodi Nutra SRL's Organic Walnut Protein Powder (Farina Proteica di Noci Biologica) is a premium, high-protein ingredient derived from 100% organic natural walnuts (Juglans Regia). Produced through a mechanical extraction process without solvents or chemical treatments, this powder retains the natural taste of raw walnuts and offers a complete amino acid profile. With a protein content ranging from 35% to 50% and low fat levels (6-13%), it is more stable against oxidation compared to traditional walnut flours. Rich in dietary fiber (12-19%), it also contains essential nutrients such as magnesium, zinc, and potassium. Certified organic under EU regulations and kosher certified, it is free from pesticides, GMOs, lactose, and latex, making it suitable for vegans and vegetarians. Ideal for enhancing bakery products like bread, pizza, and energy bars, it also serves as a versatile functional ingredient in food supplements and plant-based formulations. The powder is light to dark brown with the typical flavor of raw walnuts, offering both nutritional and sensory benefits.
